title: Interpretation of seeing fingers in a dream according to Ibn Sirin: Is it good or bad?

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing fingers in a dream by Ibn Sirin Fingers refers to a person’s feelings, how he feels about his external life, and how he relates to his family, loved ones, and friends. These feelings can be good or bad. Therefore, it is difficult to determine whether seeing fingers is a good or bad sight, because it generally shows a person's inner feelings and does not describe reality. In fact, it may convey an important message that you need to understand. If you see that you are playing with your thumb, this is a sign of your sincere love for your friends. And that you depend on them for many things, but this dream tells you that you should be careful with these friends. Because even though they are not... All of them are there, there is someone who mediates in the group, but he hates them all and wants to cause problems between you. So you should focus on the person who always causes you trouble, and gives you the most important news that may upset you from others. So this person is not a friend, but rather a hidden enemy He tries not to reveal himself so as not to reveal his case. As for seeing yourself playing with the middle finger on your hand, this is a sign that you are worried about your financial future. And fear of the big material things coming, there may be a crisis that you are going through, but this dream is a sign of It will end soon. As for the interpretation of the fingers in the dream, especially the middle finger, and wearing a ring with it, even if it is gold, this is evidence. However, your financial situation will change and soon you will have a lot of money and all the fear that you feel about money. You do not have A need and it will end soon when you feel that you are financially sufficient and that all your crises are over, and if you are in debt this means that the matter will end. And if you dream that you have extra fingers on your hand, this is a sign of abundant nourishment in life. Soon you will have a lot of money, You may inherit an inheritance. Or you will get a promotion at work that will increase your salary and therefore your finances will also improve. An injured finger in a woman’s dream. Interpretation of fingers in a dream for an ordinary woman, especially if there is a wound on the finger, indicates that the dreamer is very involved in other people’s affairs. And she worries about the lives of others, and focuses on what matters to her, and this could get her into trouble soon. Therefore, you should pay attention to this unpleasant habit and focus more on your life and affairs, because this is the important thing. Ibn Sirin points out that the wound on the virgin’s finger does not indicate On that, but rather that her love life is in danger. And that she will soon lose the one she loves and if she gets engaged, this means that her engagement will not be completed. Maybe it is good for her and not as bad as she thinks, and maybe it is her relationship. It is a completely unhealthy relationship that causes harm Psychologically and as an interpretation of injuring your fingers in a dream. It indicates that you are getting rid of the things that bother you and cause you pain, so this dream indicates the end of a difficult period. The harmful person is leaving your life, and if you see blood bleeding in a fit and you cut your fingers, this is evidence of that. You have These relationships have caused you a lot of damage and this vision also indicates that you will suffer

title: Interpretation of jumping in a dream and jumping in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of jumping from a high place in a dream for a single woman, a married woman, or a pregnant woman, jumping from the roof of a house, and jumping high into the water from the window below. Interpretation of jumping and dodging in a dream. Seeing a jump from one place to another is considered a sign of moving from one state to another, bad or good, and that the jump Related to a placeSeeing yourself jumping from roof to roof of a house indicates a change of spouse. Seeing a jump in a far away place is a sign of a long journey. Seeing a jump and controlling the jump according to the goal, so the vision indicates victory and achieving the desired or journey with benefit. Seeing a jump without reaching the goal is a sign of... That the change brought about by the dreamer will not come to fruition. Seeing yourself jumping and leaning on a stick is a sign of dependence on others. To see yourself jumping into a river, a hole or something dangerous is a sign that you will be saved from evil. If you see in your dream that you are jumping from one place to another, i.e. from one point High to another that is less high, this interpretation shows that you are in a prominent and high position and that you can conquer and overcome any obstacles. As for jumping over others, this indicates in the dream that you are superior to them in work and success or that you are in a better position than them, which will enable you to excel. Over your competitors. A great or giant leap, such as one that depicts a person jumping from the ground to the sky, indicates spiritual elevation and positive thinking, as well as high status and correctness of the decisions made in life or choices made by the dreamer and the correct attitude towards issues and matters related to his future and success. The big jump between them reflects a clear and visible change in paths and choices. The pole vault or long jump as we see it in sports, especially the Olympic Games, as well as jumping over barriers and jumping while riding a horse, are all signs of heroism and the great achievements that the spectator can achieve in his future as a result. Effort, work, perseverance, and hardship. As for jumping with one foot, it indicates a partial lack of money or means. Jumping with one foot expresses the unique will and absolute determination that the fortuneteller has, but they lack work, achievements, and activation, which means that the fortuneteller has the will to overcome his difficult situations, but the factors External factors play a negative role against him and undermine his determination and self-confidence. The sleeper may see in his dream that he is standing on a tall building such as buildings, towers, and large skyscrapers, and he may also see that he is about to jump from that high or high place. Negative feelings lurking deep within him, so he is a hesitant person who does not make his own decisions. He resorts to our own logic and sometimes hides in the face of the other person. As for the one who does not feel fear, but rather succeeds in this leap, he falls into a healthy place without harm. In interpretation, he is a balanced person in perception. And in his dealings. If he falls in an inappropriate place, such as a pit or a fire, then he is a reckless person in most cases, and the dream translates a clear message: the need to be careful and take precautions.

title: Learn about the interpretation of henna in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of henna in a dream: Henna design is one of the things that some girls tend toward, because it has many different shapes, which adds to the attractive appearance of the woman or girl. There are many colors of henna engraved on the body, and sometimes you see it. The viewer sees that he is putting henna on his hands or feet in a dream. The meanings are a sign of kindness or vice versa. In our article we want to highlight the most important interpretations of henna in a dream. Interpretation of henna in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about henna with many meanings depending on its form, emotional and binding. It can be said that the appearance of henna in a dream is better than wiping it off and removing it, especially if the dreamer is satisfied with it and its form. Beautiful, because if they are removed there may be an unpleasant, and psychological, surprise. The physical condition of the woman or girl may deteriorate, and her problems at work may multiply and she may suffer greatly from them. Interpretation of henna in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin points out that drawing henna in a dream is a happy symbol for the woman or girl, and this is because it is good news for her sincere and sincere deeds, which are... During which you want to please God Almighty and stay away from corruption. And bad deeds. The dream of henna confirms the distinct meanings of Ibn Sirin, and this is if the person is happy in the dream, it expresses real life that takes him away from difficulties and he becomes calm and beautiful, but if you remove the henna inscription and you become sad after that, the topic expresses failure in some matters and he will be exposed to disappointment. Extreme hope and despair. Interpretation of henna in a dream for a single woman. Interpreters believe that drawing henna in a dream for a girl is good news if she is a student, because her beautiful appearance expresses success in her studies and removes the difficulties she faces during that, but removing henna can have bad interpretations and a warning not to fall. In evil, she increases her concentration and studies. Henna in a dream for an unmarried woman suggests that some happy things that she hopes to achieve. The Asrar Dream Interpretation website is a website specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. All you have to do is type the Asrar Dream Interpretation website in Google and get the correct interpretations.Interpretation of a dream about henna on the hands for a single womanWith an unmarried woman putting henna on her hands in a dream for an unmarried woman, interpretive scholars confirm that she will be associated with a person who will make her happy and give her confidence, and the dream is confirmation of her desire to To be her. Connected to someone close to her, do good and praise God Almighty always. Interpretation of henna in a dream for a married womanHenna in a dream for a married woman carries signs of happiness, because its good shape is an explanation of the large size of the vulva and the elimination of the disorders that she suffers from, whether they are physical and related to illness or psychological and lead to harm Serious because of it. Disagreements and mistrust with her husband. One of the signs of seeing henna and its beautiful design in a woman’s dream is that she lives in a happy reality, full of luck and success, and it hurts others. Interpretation of henna in a dream for a pregnant woman. When a pregnant woman sees henna inscriptions in the vision, it can be said that her psychological state is good and stable, even

title: Learn more about the interpretation of the name Ali in a dream and its meaning by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What you do not know about the interpretation of the name Ali during sleep: A person sees many dreams and visions in his dreams, some of which have good interpretations, and some have dreams that carry difficult interpretations, and the name Ali in a dream is one of the visions that many people dream of, and since this name means high and wonderful. Sublime, most of its interpretations in the vision are positive, and here are the most prominent interpretations of a dream with the name Ali through the following. The name Ali in a dream Seeing the name Ali in a dream is one of the good visions in its interpretation, because it indicates the greatness of the dreamer’s position in society, and the jurists confirmed that the name Ali in a man’s dream means God gives him a great position in Islam, and he has a word that Muslims respect, because his abundance of knowledge will make everyone listen to him, and many will consult him on matters of their religion until they come from him with sound legal advice without falsehood. When the dreamer dreams that his name is Ali, this means that he is a person known for his honor and adherence to principles. Which he was raised on, no matter what happens in his life he will never change and will continue the teachings. From his religion, this dream means that the dreamer will not submit to the refuge of the world and will choose to always be with God. If the dreamer is subjected to humiliation and humiliation by others as a result of his need for money in reality and he sees in his dream the name of Ali written in front of him in a bright hand, the interpretation is that the dreamer will make him greater than those who They insulted and despised his weak abilities due to his need... and the good news is that he should wait for his position to be established and he will be freed from the womb of suffering due to God’s mercy and help soon. If the dreamer is sick in reality and not all the doctors healed him until he despairs and stops looking for a cure for him and sees in his dream that there is an old man wearing white clothes Clean and elegant and entered his home carrying gifts or delicious food, this dream interprets that God is able to heal anyone, no matter how sick he is, and the dreamer will be impressed by his recovery in reality soon. When the dreamer dreams that he is standing in front of the grave of our master Ali and is surprised that the visitors to the shrine are prostrating to themselves as if they are worshiping Imam Ali instead of God, this dream expresses an imminent disturbance that will occur in... The state and the will are a disturbance in faith and will shake the people of the country from believing in their religion, so this dream is interpreted as a great disturbance that will overwhelm the country and its people. If the dreamer dreams of seeing Imam Ali in front of him and verifying the features of his face, then this dream warns the dreamer that he is among those whom God accepts, and that All his prayers are counted for him and the degree of his faith is. He grows from what he was and his heart is filled with love for God. Whoever sees Imam Ali in a dream, the interpretation is complete that the dreamer has chosen asceticism, isolation, and abandonment of worldly pleasures and forbidden desires. An Egyptian specialized website that includes a group of leading translators of dreams and visions in the Arab world. Seeing a person named Ali in A single woman’s dream: If an unmarried girl in reality rejects everyone who comes to her to marry her with the intention of wanting to marry a young man with a high social and financial status and she sees in her dream a person named Ali laughing at her, then this dream is interpreted. As she will marry a young man with the same specifications as she dreamed of in terms of height

title: A detailed interpretation of the dream of swimming in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream revolving around in a dream in detail, interpretation of a dream about Utrabella for an unmarried girl, interpretation of a dream about humiliation for an unmarried woman, interpretation of humiliation without sound in a dream, interpretation of a dream I had about an unmarried woman, I dreamed that I was screaming, and seeing a woman screaming in a dream, and a dead person screaming In a dream, seeing one person screaming in a dream. Interpretation of seeing waves in a dream: A dreamer’s voice is a warning... Beware! First, eulogies in dreams generally symbolize inherited rituals and traditions in the society in which the dreamer resides, and their interpretations relate to the events to which the eulogy relates. Secondly, oaths in a dream can symbolize joy, weddings, and happy occasions to which the dreamer can contribute, if eulogies are given in His community on these occasions. Thirdly, mockery in a dream may indicate sadness, funerals, and bad circumstances that the dreamer will experience, especially if hymns are heard on such occasions in the dreamer’s community. Fourth: If the woman who dreams is pregnant, and she sees someone screaming in her sleep, and the number reaches three This is an indication that she will give birth to a boy. However, if she sees that the number of insults does not exceed one, then this is a sign that she will give birth to a girl. Fifth: Whoever’s family is traveling or traveling and dreams of screaming in his sleep, then this is a sign either of the return of relatives or his return in the near future. Sixth, the sign in the dream may indicate sects. Which the dreamer will take during the coming period or the one in which he participates. Interpretation of the dream of Majd Ibn Sirin. The respected researcher pointed out that seeing howling in a dream symbolizes joys and happy occasions in general, and interpreting Lozo as evidence of happiness depends on the society and traditions of the dreamer. Whoever sees the hunter in his dream, And his parents, son, or one of his beloved relatives is traveling, so seeing a boat indicates the traveler’s return in the near future. Also, screaming in a dream indicates something invented by the one who saw the vision, and seeing the look in a dream is a warning from this sect. As for the one who sees joy in his dream and it has grooves Seeing it indicates a calamity that will befall the dreamer. Interpretation of Ibn Shaheen’s vision of glorification. Interpretation of the dream that flows in the dream symbolizes the incoming positive energy that the individual feels. Interpretation of the dream of a groove in the house, indicates that the dreamer hears happy news and gets rid of worries and sorrows in life. Seeing joy accompanied by music means that you will hear sad news or fall into distress. Interpretation of reading Imam Al-Sadiq’s hymns: To dream that you are climbing in a dream for no reason, this indicates the coming of misfortunes and sorrows to the dreamer. As for seeing yourself screaming in a dream on a happy occasion, which carries Good news for the future, as it is Mahmoud’s vision for the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about swimming for single people. If an unmarried woman sees greetings in her dream and is engaged, then her vision indicates the approaching date of her wedding, but if she is not engaged, then this dream indicates a close relationship. Interpretation of chasing a girl in a dream who is still studying In a dream, which indicates her success and the extent of her excellence in her studies. When she sees

title: I dreamed that I was pregnant and bleeding

preview.html: I dreamed that I was pregnant and bleeding through a website. Looking at the website roy2a.com, a pregnant woman is exposed to many symptoms associated with pregnancy such as bleeding, lack of fetal movement, fainting or other symptoms that leave the mother in constant fear and anxiety that the child will be harmed and we will discuss with you. Today for the interpretations that came from the great dream interpreters of seeing bleeding from a pregnant woman during sleep, such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and Ibn Shaheen, so follow us. I dreamed that I was pregnant and bleeding. It is considered seeing bleeding from a pregnant woman in a dream. A promising and unobtrusive vision may be a sign that the birth process will pass easily and the mother will be happy with the fetus. Healthy, God willing. Seeing bleeding from a pregnant woman’s body is a sign of the banks and costs that this mother will spend on her birth and her next child. Seeing bleeding in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that it is a sign of saving her from fatigue, distress, and pain and changing her circumstances and life for the better. I dreamed that I was pregnant and blood came out of me in case the woman was pregnant. Indeed, in her final months, the dream was a sign of the ease of childbirth and the nourishment that would come to her. See also: I dreamed that I was pregnant and that I was alone. Interpretation of the appearance of a pregnant woman who had a menstrual cycle. Seeing the menstrual cycle in a pregnant woman’s dream. She will give birth to her child safely, and it will be a healthy child, God willing. – Bleeding Heavy menstruation and the woman is pregnant is a sign of her need to take care of her health and the health of her fetus. I dreamed of black menstrual blood in a dream when I was pregnant. This vision is considered a sign that she is exposed to psychological pressures and problems in her life that are reflected in her physical health. Ibn Sirin says that seeing menstrual blood in a pregnant woman’s dream is a sign that The woman has been hurt before and her conscience rebukes her and she thinks about it and she must repent and ask for forgiveness. See also: I dreamed that I was pregnant and that I was married. I dreamed that I was pregnant and bleeding when I was not pregnant. Seeing a woman who is not pregnant in a dream and blood spilling, shows that sustenance will come next time. Seeing a pregnancy with bleeding in A woman’s dream means that she is not pregnant. She thinks a lot about childbearing and pregnancy and longs for this stage. The dream of bleeding due to pregnancy indicates that the insight was not pregnant and did not think about having children. It is news about the successes and successes that accompanied her in achieving her goals and what she seeks. Interpretation of the occurrence of vaginal bleeding. Seeing blood In a married woman’s dream, a good vision indicates a change in this woman’s condition for the better, happiness and abundant nutrition. Seeing black blood coming out of the vagina in a dream indicates that the problems and obstacles that the woman faces in this period and cause her sadness and anxiety. Seeing bleeding from the vagina in a pregnant woman’s dream is an indication that She has a male, and God knows best. As for seeing blood coming out of the vagina accompanied by severe pain and fatigue, it is an indication of the crises and problems that the dreamer will suffer from in the coming period. See also: Interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman and giving birth to children in a dream. We are happy to show you the place where your dreams will be received. “I dreamed that I was pregnant and bled” from Through the comments, the dream team will interpret your dream and the solution

title: What you have never heard before about the interpretation of a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of taameya in a dream: Taameya is one of the most famous and popular breakfast meals, and seeing taameya in a dream raises many questions for the fortuneteller. Do you think it indicates good or evil? This is due to the many ways to prepare falafel. Some people like to eat it cooked in hot oil, while others do not like it as well, as well as the different types. This vision varied a lot depending on its types and methods of preparation, and it has the sum of the words spoken in interpreting this vision, that it seems good to the fortuneteller and all of this is good news for him. Through our Egyptian website, Taameya in a dream, if a person sees himself in a dream, this indicates the blessing and goodness that God will bestow on this person - the Most High - and this tremendous goodness did not come from nowhere, but rather because of this man’s good character and his relationship with his Lord has improved. God Almighty has rewarded him for This is due to his blessings in his life and adorning it with blessings, because it is known that the reward is of the type of action, and God Almighty does not make anyone wrong. But if a woman sees bait in her dream; This shows the kindness of this woman to those around her. If she is not married, her charity should be directed to her parents and relatives, but if she is married, her kindness should be directed to her husband, children, and her husband’s relatives. May God grant her success and ease in all areas of her life. But if a woman sees that she is preparing food for her husband and she is happy. If it indicates that: then it is clear that this man feeds her from what is permissible, so he asks for what is permissible and what is forbidden according to what was given to him, and likewise his money is not impure with any forbidden impurity. . This is an indication that this house is a good house, and of course the descendants of this house will be good. Because the best of the children is in the best interests of the parents. But if a woman sees in her dream that she is preparing to become pregnant, and she is sad at this time. This indicates that her husband is doing illegal actions. To make money from it, this, if it is pointed out, indicates the corruption and lack of justice of that house. Because if the master of the house was in such a bad state, how could his children, of course, be in even worse condition. Because the head of the family has an active role in shaping the personality of the children. Whoever sees that he is preparing food in his sleep. This indicates that this person will achieve the desires he sought, and this is evidence of a lack of communication and dependence on asking for something. Because whoever asks for something must work hard and work hard. Until he gets what he wants. Beans and falafel in a dream: Whoever sees beans and falafel in his sleep; This indicates that this man makes a lot of profits from his trade, and this profit comes from the legitimate methods that God Almighty has permitted, because he only benefits from what is legitimate, and he only trades in what exists. Legal. If this indicates that, it indicates that God would not have cared about his trade, buying, and selling. May God bless him with his money. This trade has grown more than he expected. If a woman sees in her dream that she is preparing fava beans and falafel in her dream, this varies depending on the woman’s condition, if that woman is single. This indicates that God will provide this woman with a good man who fears God in secret and in public, and preserves what God has commanded

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a calf in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a calf in a dream. A calf in a dream is obtaining money and satisfying desires, as the Bible explains. The calf is the son of a cow and after a while it becomes cows or bulls, that is, we provide calves that provide the best fat. Content requested by our customers. Mainly because of the fear of anger or aggression, but it is a little different in men. As soon as I see a calf in my dream, there are many searches for its interpretation on social media, so according to the scholar Ibn Sirin, give an interpretation of that. Dreaming of a calf in a dream is a social dream. Whether it is a single girl or a married woman, pregnant women are still men. Interpretation of a dream about a calf for a single woman: Dreaming of seeing a calf in a dream There are many interpretations of the interpretation of a dream about a maverick in a dream for a young girl, but most of them are not worthy of praise. Mavericks dreamed of an unmarried girl or woman Unmarried, which indicates that he has relatives and is married to a stubborn and incompetent person. Perhaps the dream of a young girl in a dream indicates the presence of an ambitious person in her life, so you should stay away from him. A rebound dream for an unmarried woman symbolizes the problems caused by the presence of homosexuals in her life Interpretation of a dream about a calf for a married woman. A dream about seeing a calf in a dream. Among the dreams of married women, Mavericks’ dreams bring good news to her and her husband, and God knows best. A calf is dreamed of in a married woman’s dream with the news that she will become pregnant. However, according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, it is better not to interpret a dream about slaughtering calves in a married woman’s dream. Because it indicates her separation from her husband. Interpretation of a dream about a calf for a pregnant woman: A dream about seeing a calf in a dream A dream about a calf portends a dream for a pregnant woman, on the basis that it is easy to bear, God willing. And if the dream of a calf in a pregnant woman’s dream symbolizes that God will give her a beautiful child, God is the Most High and Most Knowledgeable. Dreaming of a pregnant woman, dreaming of a calf, means that she will earn a living and will earn a lot of money soon. Dreaming of a calf in a pregnant woman’s dream brings many benefits and fulfills the dreamer’s dream. Interpretation of a dream of a calf for a man: A dream of seeing a calf in a dream God is the highest A wheel, a dream of a young man, evidence of close contact and marriage, God is supreme. A dream of eating beef in a man’s dream indicates that earning money through travel makes the transition to a new life. But soon after, he dreamed of slaughtering Mavericks in a man’s dream, which is a sign On financial benefits. A dream of slaughtering a calf in a dream for a married man can foretell the happy skin of his future wife’s pregnancy. What is the interpretation of seeing a small calf in a dream? Seeing a calf in a dream bodes well for the pioneer. It also indicates a good life. Dreaming of seeing a calf in a dream Seeing a small calf It means getting rid of the problems and difficulties that the dreamer faces. What is the interpretation of seeing a black calf in a dream for a married woman? Seeing a black calf in a married woman’s dream means the end of marital disputes and a calm and stable life. It also indicates the abundance of sustenance and the abundance of goodness. What is the interpretation of seeing the fear of a calf in a dream? Dream of seeing a calf in a dream if you see fear of

preview.html: Strange sweets in a dream, which are Eastern or Western sweets made from flour, sugar, and ghee. They are baked and have a good and distinctive taste. Seeing it in a dream has beautiful meanings that indicate a lot of goodness for the dreamer, an abundance of blessings and prosperity, and the fulfillment of the dreamer’s dreams and desires. In addition, it was your relative or friend. To provide many services to him. Strange sweets in a woman’s dream. Ibn Shaheen’s opinion on the interpretation of a dream about eating sweets for unmarried women indicates engagement or marriage for the girl in the near future. And her dreams and desires will come true. Seeing a girl buying sweets means joy and happiness, and if she is a student, this indicates her academic excellence. Strange sweets in a dream for a pregnant woman. A single girl. If a pregnant woman dreams that she is eating strange food, this indicates ease of pregnancy, ease of childbirth, and the birth of a beautiful girl. Happiness and stability in her married life. Interpretation of a dream about strange sweets for a married woman. Seeing strange sweets in a married woman’s dream indicates happiness. And stability in married life. It also indicates the approach of a happy event, such as a pregnancy that you have been waiting for for years. Also, sweets in a dream indicate high status, honor, power, and good news. Interpretation of distributing sweets in a dream to a pregnant woman: It represents distributing sweets to people in a pregnant woman’s dream Good health, safety, and an end to fatigue and pain. It also indicates the completion of a safe pregnancy and the birth of a healthy child. Interpretation of a dream about distributing sweets to the soul of the deceased. If you see that you are distributing sweets to the soul of a deceased relative or known person in the dream, the interpretation shows that you are constantly thinking about the deceased, and this is if he was one of Your relatives or friends, in addition to giving him many good gifts. If he sees that he is distributing sweets to the soul of his father or mother, then he must do a lot of alms and supplication. A strange interpretation of sweets for a man. Seeing strange sweets in a dream indicates many job opportunities and finding a prestigious job. Strange sweets in a dream also show the fortune teller’s great help and that he will succeed in his life and reach the highest ranks. It also indicates the man’s stability in his life and marital happiness. And the young man seeing strange sweets to fulfill his dreams and desires and marry a beautiful girl. Interpretation of a dream about distributing sweets to people for a married woman: It shows distributing strange sweets In a dream on a married woman, which indicates many good deeds, love for people, cooperation with others, and good news. Strange sweets in a dream, and if she is the one preparing sweets for distribution, this indicates a happy event and happy news soon. It may indicate her promotion at work. To a higher rank if the woman is an employee, or her husband is promoted at work or to another prestigious position. Interpretation of a dream about distributing sweets to children: Seeing him distributing sweets to children indicates the fulfillment of dreams and desires for the major. Strange sweets in a dream, if the woman is pregnant and dreams of offering strange sweets. For children, this is a sign that she will achieve what she wants and that a beautiful girl will be born and she will be happy with that

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing Surat Al-Qiyamah in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing Surat Al-Qiyamah in a dream with distinctive Arabic content that suits the Arab reader, and we will present to you the interpretation of a dream about Surat Al-Qiyamah according to what was stated in his books by the scholar Ibn Sirin and Ibn Al-Nabulsi.Interpretation of a dream about seeing Surat Al-Qiyamah by Ibn SirinInterpretation of a dream about Ibn Sirin in a dream about Surat Al-Qiyamah: Whoever sees that he is reading it will refrain from reading it. Abstain from cursing and do not swear under any circumstances. Interpretation of a dream about Surat Al-Qiyamah in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi interpreted the dream of dreaming about Surat Al-Qiyamah, and said: Whoever reads it or has it read to him, as Jaafar Al-Sadiq, may God be pleased with him, said about him: He is generous in spirit. It was said that he distances himself from the just and immoral faith, so he does not swear to the truth nor to false people, and they are unfair to him, and I hope that you will hear him. Interpretation of a dream about Surat Al-Qiyamah in the pink millennium The pink millennium has come and the difficulty of livelihood has come with the veil and the noble resurrection of mankind. Whoever reads Surat Al-Qiyamah in his sleep or something from it, will be Generous in himself, fond of feeding food, he is said to shun unusual and fantastic faith, so as not to swear by truth or falsehood. And God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing Surat Al-Qiyamah in a dream. And whoever reads it in a dream or something like that, or if you read it to him, Jaafar Al-Sadiq, may God be pleased with him, mentioned that he is generous in spirit and nourishes food. Al-Ahsa’s interpretation in a dream of Surat Al-Qiyamah in a dream indicates that the death of its reciter It is due to martyrdom or fear of God’s punishment, generosity, and avoiding immorality. Today, through the “Moments” website, we presented to you the interpretation of a dream about Surah Resurrection in a dream. If you have questions or dreams looking for an interpretation, share your comments with us and our experts will respond to them as soon as possible. Available time.
